A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The most pervasive Star Wars character thru the decades is Luke Skywalker. His portrayal as a crotchety old curmudgeon divorced from the struggle & the Force throws a thin shroud of pessimism\, even confusion over the whole concept of the Force. From the weird chases in CasinoWorld\, to the illogical existence of the code breaker\, there were too many impossible scenes that were not believable. So many square pegs stuffed into round holes.
